Eastern will host a Graduate School Information Day at  a.m PERIOD Wednesday in the Grand and University ballrooms of the Martin Luther King Jr PERIOD University Union PERIOD



Students can obtain information from a variety of graduate degree programs including Eastern and otherschools and universities from the Midwest PERIOD

For more information contact Bobbi Kingery at  or at emailprotected PERIOD

Study Abroad sessions provided

Two Study Abroad informational sessions will discuss separate traveling opportunities Wednesday for the summer  semester PERIOD

The first one Ethnobotany in China will be presented from  to  p.m PERIOD Wednesday in Room  of Life Sciences Building PERIOD

For more information contact Gordon Tucker at  or at emailprotected PERIOD

The second meeting is for the Australia and New Zealand Study Abroad Trip scheduled for June  PERIOD It will be from  to  p.m PERIOD Wednesday in Room  of Coleman Hall PERIOD

For more information contact Mark Borzi at  or at emailprotected PERIOD

Compiled by Associate News Editor Bob Bajek
